author: Ben DiPietro
title: Survey Roundup: Regulatory Inconsistencies Take Toll on Companies - Risk & Compliance Journal. - WSJ
text:
Cost of Divergence: Inconsistencies in regulation among various jurisdictions—regulatory divergence—cost financial institutions between 5% and 10% of their annual revenue, according to a survey of 251 compliance and risk-management officers and senior leaders by the International Federation of Accountants and Business at the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development.
